title: Cloud Secure special
subtitle: Cloud Secure discount offered
author: admin
body:
Cloud Secure is offering a deal of $3.75 per month on startup shared hosting. This deal includes a one time 30 day free trial, so the first month is on us.

This offer includes unlimited data storage, unlimited transfers, 5 hosted domains and more.

Lower prices are also offered for yearly signups.

Visithttps://cloudsecure.host  today.

title: Nomatec Hosting special
subtitle: Nomatec Hosting discount offered
author: admin
body:
Nomatec Hosting is offering starter shared web hosting for the low price of $33 per year.

This includes unlimited storage, unlimited data transfers, unlimited sub-domains, 5 MySQL databases with unlimited quota and more.

Visithttps://www.nomatechosting.comtoday.
